name: Lion
movement: fast runner able to move 50 feet
description: The lion is a large beast with a muscular body, known for its sharp claws, powerful jaws, and males with thick manes. Female lions are sleeker and faster, reflecting their roles as primary hunters.
memorable: Known as the 'king of the beasts,' the lion exemplifies both majesty and ferocity, especially when defending its pride.
goals: Lions hunt in packs, aiming to take down large prey such as antelope and buffalo.
relations: Typically found in prides, lions interact with other prey animals and can occasionally be found alongside other predators.
strengths: Possesses Pack Tactics, allowing for advantageous attacks when allies are nearby, and Keen Smell provides heightened tracking capabilities.
weaknesses: Vulnerable due to relatively low hit points and poor Intelligence, leaving them less savvy against cunning foes.
attacks: Engages in fierce melee combat with claws and bites; claws can knock foes prone after a charge.
most_powerful_ability: Pack Tactics grants advantage on attack rolls against foes near allies, enhancing its melee effectiveness.
senses: The lion has heightened perception through its Keen Smell ability for tracking and locating prey.
skills: Proficient in Stealth, making it quite sneaky despite its large size.
additional_information: Able to leap long distances with Running Leap.
Can unleash a Rattling Roar to impose disadvantages on opponents.
Utilizes pounce tactics to gain advantages in combat.
Commonly referred to as 'king of the beasts' due to its apex predator status.
Works cooperatively with pride members to hunt efficiently.
